title: Dani Dyer packs on the PDA with beau Sammy Kimmence at Specsavers event
text:
Stars from across all industries turned up for the annual glasses-wearing event.

And Dani Dyer put on a cosy display with her boyfriend Sammy Kimmence at the Specsavers Spectacle Wearer of the Year awards on Tuesday.

The 2018 Love Island winner, 23, couldn't resist packing on the PDA with her stockbroker beau as they embraced on the red carpet.

Smitten: Dani Dyer put on a cosy display with her boyfriend Sammy Kimmence at the Specsavers Spectacle Wearer of the Year awards on Tuesday

While after the star-studded bash, Dani walked hand-in-hand with Sammy as they headed home.

The daughter of EastEnders star Danny Dyer looked chic for the event in a pair of high-waisted leather trousers.

She teamed the item of clothing with a black sheer ruffled high-neck top with a heart pattern on it.

Cosy: The 2018 Love Island winner, 23, couldn't resist packing on the PDA with her stockbroker beau as they walked hand-in-hand

Sweet: The daughter of EastEnders star Danny Dyer also couldn't resist sharing a sweet embrace with her boyfriend on the red carpet

Stylish: Dani looked chic for the event in a pair of high-waisted black leather trousers

Adding some finishing touches, Dani opted for a pair of black thick-framed glasses and jewel-encrusted barely-there heeled sandals.

The reality star styled her blonde locks into a curly blow-dried ponytail and added a slick of glamorous make-up.

Meanwhile, Sammy opted for a pair of black skinny jeans, a matching coloured T-shirt and a blue blazer, he added a pair of black glasses.

Details: She teamed the item of clothing with a black sheer ruffled high-neck top with a heart pattern on it

Glamorous: The reality star styled her blonde locks into a curly blow-dried ponytail and added a slick of glamorous make-up

Dapper: Meanwhile, Sammy opted for a pair of black skinny jeans, a matching coloured T-shirt and a blue blazer

During Love Island 2018, Dani's on-screen relationship with ex-boyfriend Jack Fincham won the nation's hearts as the pair took home the crown.

Yet she and Jack split just months after they left the villa and she's now with the 23-year-old stockbroker who grew up in Essex with Dani.

He works for a private brokers company in London and is also an amateur footballer who plays midfield for Barkingside FC, report Heart.

The outing comes after Dani revealed that she sought the help of a psychiatrist after struggling to cope with the fame and attention Love Island brought her in a candid interview in July.

Rise to fame: During Love Island 2018, Dani's on-screen relationship with ex-boyfriend Jack Fincham won the nation's hearts as the pair took home the crown (pictured in 2018)

Speaking to Stella magazine, the reality star opened up about the aftermath of living in the famous villa, with the months following also seeing the breakdown of her relationship with Jack.

She admitted to the publication: 'It can be very tough.'

'I spoke to a psychologist from the show before I went on and afterwards. I had several calls from the producers checking if I was OK,' she said.

'And a few weeks after the show, when I felt overwhelmed and said I needed to speak to someone, they put me in touch with a psychiatrist.'
description: The 2018 Love Island winner, 23, couldn't resist packing on the PDA with her stockbroker beau as they embraced on the red carpet.
